title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 44.90 - State aid reimbursement amounts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 44.90 - State aid reimbursement amounts

State Regulations

Under emergency situations, the department shall reimburse counties or municipalities for 50 percent of the cost for emergency vector control measures as approved by the department. Emergency funds will only be available after the county or municipality has expended all other forms of State aid for vector surveillance and vector control programs. Notes

44.90

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
